DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether investigational vaccine delivery device ( ID adapter ) safely precisely inject liquid intradermal layer skin .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Safety Evaluation Intradermal Delivery Device
DOC.criteria: Female male participant age 18 55 year . Healthy enough participate clinical trial per site investigator assessment . Healthy skin upper deltoid region arm . Able provide sign informed consent understand study procedure per ICH/GCP guideline . Literate English . Available telephone 48 hour study visit . Skin abnormalities upper deltoid region either arm ( scar , rash , infection ) skin condition would interfere ability visualize intradermal injection opinion investigator . Unable understand study purpose procedure .
